meta.name: Data Quality Audit
meta.description: Creates a lightweight data-quality checklist plus targeted queries to run.

data.label: Checklist
data.prompt: Create a data-quality checklist for the described dataset: completeness, validity, timeliness, consistency, anomalies. Bullet format.

data.label: Probe Queries
data.prompt: Propose 5 targeted queries or sanity checks (in plain English) to reveal issues. Include why each matters.

data.label: Audit Summary
data.prompt: Summarize the checklist and queries into a short audit plan with priorities (P1-P3).
